result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Arson of Building w/o Owner's Consent

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonathan Joseph Polich

records.addlTxt: Application for Search Warrant, Affidavit, Return of Officer, Acknowledgment of Return of Officer for 2012 White Range Rover Land Rover.
Application for Search Warrant, Affidavit, Return of Officer, Acknowledgement of Return of Officer for 4165 STH 57, Sturgeon Bay.

No contact direct or indirect with R.G., M.G., C.G., K.G., S.B., G.B., R.J.G., E.D. M.G. & A.M., their residences and their places of employment. Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release.  GPS Monitoring.

1:10 PM    Defendant Jonathan Joseph Polich in court, in custody.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Todd Simon appears for SPD by phone for defendant Jonathan Polich.   Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel, right to prelim.  Court adjourns matter today to give SPD time to see if defendant qualifies for their representation or not.  Court questions defendant on address/employment.  Court finds probable cause to set bond.  Bond set.   Atty Simon reserves the right to argue bond at the adjourned initial appearance.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.
